pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the long-term outcomes of transurethral resection of the prostate (TURP) immediately after high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) treatment for prostate cancer (CaP).

metaData.source:
Sector-switching sonication strategy for accelerated HIFU treatment of prostate cancer: in vitro experimental validation
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19709958/
